sense.gloss: to think, to consider, to believe, to reckon
to think (of doing), to plan (to do)
to judge, to assess, to regard
to imagine, to suppose, to dream
to expect, to look forward to
to feel, to be (in a state of mind), to desire, to want
commemoration, celebration, remembrance, memory, honoring the memory of
(Platonic) ideal (of how things ought to be, e.g. human rights), foundational principle, idea, conception (e.g. of the university), doctrine, ideology

sdata.j: ↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓ながらそれは↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓なのです。
↑痩↑↓や↓せる↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓がないというのは↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓だ。
sdata.e: It's too bad that I don't need to lose weight.

sdata.j: アメリカ↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓のよい↑記念↑↓きねん↓になります。
sdata.e: This will be a good souvenir of my trip around the United States.

sdata.j: あなたがじゃがいもを↑買↑↓か↓うように↑奇蹟↑↓きせき↓を↑買↑↓か↓うことができないなんて↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓だわ。
sdata.e: It's a pity that you can't buy miracles like you would buy potatoes.

sdata.j: ↑意見↑↓いけん↓は↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑掌握↑↓しょうあく↓し、↑信念↑↓しんねん↓は↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑掌握↑↓しょうあく↓する。
sdata.e: Our opinion is an idea which we have; our conviction an idea which has us.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑来↑↓こ↓られないのが↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓だ。
sdata.e: It's a pity that you can't come.

sdata.j: あなたがおいでにならないのは↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓です。
sdata.e: It's a pity that you can't come.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑言↑↓い↓うことを↑信↑↓しん↓じてくれないのは、↑非常↑↓ひじょう↓に↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓です。
sdata.e: That you don't believe me is a great pity.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓を↑離↑↓はな↓れるのは↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓だ。
sdata.e: It's a pity that you should leave Japan.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓を↑離↑↓はな↓れるとは↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓だ。
sdata.e: It's a pity that you should leave Japan.

words.gloss: to think, to consider, to believe, to reckon
